name: Me Make Monster
tag_list: clothing, apparel, products, t-shirts, children, kids, entertainment, on-demand, print, custom, zazzle
overview:
Me Make Monster allows users to create a custom monster, then have it printed it on t-shirts, mugs, hats, and other products.

Targeting boys 8-12 years old, Me Make Monster presents users with an interface that allows them to create a monster, changing the body parts (as well as size and position), color, skin texture, and name.

Next, users save the monster and select a product type. They are then transferred to Zazzle.com. Using the Zazzle API, their monster image is seamlessly imposed upon product templates. Users can make additional modifications to the size and position of their monster image, and also select style, color, size, and other product options. They can make a purchase.

In addition to ordering products, users may also download their monster image, and share it automatically on Facebook or Twitter.

Future plans include adding optional account registration, which would allow users to store multiple monsters in a gallery, add them to interactive stories, online games and other activities.
